definition: to annihilate/to wipe out completely/to exterminate
to annihilate/abbr. for 殲擊機|歼击机, fighter plane

sentences.english: We wiped out all the invading enemy.
Eg: The small army had to choose to surrender immediately or face total annihilation.
sentences.chinese: 他們要麼立刻投降，要麼面臨全殲的命運。

sentences.english: The choice of the enemy troops has been completely wiped out.
sentences.chinese: 敵人的精銳部隊已被全殲。

sentences.english: To completely destroy or capture the enemy.
